abstract: Editorial demands that both Interior Department and Royal Dutch Shell prove they have learned lessons of disastrous BP oil spill in Gulf of Mexico before Shell gets the go ahead to drill in Arctic Ocean; warns unless the United States makes smart decisions about drilling in American waters, others are unlikely to do any better.
snippet: Before the Interior Department gives Shell the go ahead to drill in the Arctic Ocean, it must ensure that all the safeguards are in place.
lead_paragraph: Before the Interior Department gives Shell the go ahead to drill in the Arctic Ocean, it must ensure that all the safeguards are in place.

headline.main: The Arctic and the Lessons of the Gulf
headline.print_headline: The Arctic and the Lessons of the Gulf
headline.seo: The Arctic and the Lessons of the Gulf
